Text_Spanish: No tiene nada del otro mundo

Text_English: I see no reason for doing that
Text_Spanish: No veo razón para hacer eso

Text_English: I don't get it - Too complicated
Text_Spanish: No lo pillo - Es demasiado complicado
Ya le di una vuelta a aquello

Text_English: This mistery is a hard puzzle to solve
Text_Spanish: Este misterio es un gran rompecabezas que resolver

Text_English: Victim seems to be poisoned. Could be poison is still in kitchen or fest room?
Text_Spanish: La víctima parece haber sido envenenada. Puede ser que el veneno esté aún en la cocina o el gran salón?

Text_English: Victim is definitely gone! They all claim he was poisoned
Text_Spanish: La víctima definitivamente ha sucumbido! Todos dicen que ha sido envenenado

Text_English: I'm innocent! I just brought all food this morning! no one more complained
Text_Spanish: Soy inocente! Solo traje la comida esta mañana! Nadie más se ha quejado

Text_English: That! Is what you'll need to prove in court when they come after you
Text_Spanish: Eso! Es lo que tendrás que demostrar en un juicio! En cuanto entren a por ti

Text_English: I have enough time to demonstrate my innocence
Text_Spanish: Tengo tiempo suficiente para demostrar mi inocencia

Text_English: Don't go too far. They are comming after you
Text_Spanish: No te vayas muy lejos. Ya vienen a por ti

Text_English: There will be a court process and I am the only suspicious
Text_Spanish: Habrá un juicio y soy el único sospechoso

Text_English: By the moment I see the only solution is to flee
Text_Spanish: Por el momento solo veo la opción de huir
